articles.author: Jasmine Aguilera/Tijuana, Mexico
articles.title: Caught Between U.S. Policies and Instability at Home, Haitian Migrants in Tijuana Are in a State of Limbo
articles.description: Haitians stranded at the U.S.-Mexico border are in a state of limbo due to U.S. immigration policies that would send them back to Haiti.

articles.author: Sanjana Karanth
articles.title: U.S. To Expand Passport Gender Markers For Nonbinary, Intersex Americans
articles.description: For the first time, the State Department will allow people to obtain passports and IDs using a gender neutral "X" marker instead of "M" or "F."

articles.author: Laurent Duvernay-Tardif, as told to Charlotte Gibson
articles.title: Laurent Duvernay-Tardif: Be bigger than your sport
articles.description: Chiefs offensive lineman Laurent Duvernay-Tardif is a finalist for the Muhammad Ali Sports Humanitarian Award after opting out of the 2020 NFL season to work as an orderly. He doesn't want to be called a hero.
